spell.name: Acid Stream
entries: A stream of acid emanates from you in a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be covered in acid for the spell's duration or until a creature uses its action to scrape or wash the acid off itself or another creature. A creature covered in the acid takes {@damage 3d4} acid damage at start of each of its turns.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 使用 2 级或更高的法术槽施放此法术时，法术槽等级每超过 1 级，伤害就会增加 {@scaledamage 3d4|1-9|1d4}。

spell.name: Otherworldly Form

m.text: an object engraved with a symbol of the Outer Planes, worth at least 500 gp

entries: 通过念咒语，你利用下层世界或上层世界的魔法（由你选择）来改造自己。在咒语结束之前，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你对火和毒的伤害（下层世界）或辐射和坏死的伤害（上层世界）免疫。
You are immune to the {@condition poisoned} condition (Lower Planes) or the {@condition charmed} condition (Upper Planes).
幽灵之翼出现在你的背上，使你的飞行速度达到40英尺。
你所有的武器攻击都具有魔力，当你进行武器攻击时，你可以使用你的法术能力修饰，而不是力量或灵巧，来进行攻击和伤害卷。
当你在你的回合中采取攻击行动时，你可以攻击两次，而不是一次。如果你已经有了像 "额外攻击 "这样的功能，可以给你带来额外的攻击，你就会忽略这个好处。

spell.name: Spirit Shroud
entries: 你召唤出亡灵，在咒语的持续时间内它们会在你身边飞舞。亡灵是无形的，无坚不摧的，它们是善的或恶的（你选择）。

Until the spell ends, any attack you make deals {@damage 1d8} extra damage when you hit a creature within 10 feet of you. This damage is radiant if the spirits are good and necrotic if they are evil. Any creature that takes this damage can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn.
此外，你所选择的任何你能看到的、在你10英尺范围内开始其回合的生物，其速度降低10英尺，直到你下一个回合开始。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@scaledamage 1d8|3-9|1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Summon Aberrant Spirit

m.text: a pickled tentacle and an eyeball in a crystal vial worth at least 400 gp

entries: You call forth a spirit from the Far Realm or another alien realm of madness. The spirit manifests physically in an unoccupied space that you can see within range. This corporeal form uses the {@creature Aberrant Spirit|UA2020SpellsAndMagicTattoos} stat block. When you cast the spell, choose Beholderkin, Slaadi, or Star Spawn. The creature physically resembles your choice, which also determines some of the traits in its stat block. The creature disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends.
该生物在咒语持续期间对你和你的同伴都很友好。在战斗中，该生物分享你的主动权，但它会在你之后立即进入自己的回合。它服从你对它发出的口头命令（不需要你采取行动）。如果你没有发出任何命令，它就自我防御，但除此之外不采取任何行动。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels

entries: You call forth the spirit of a beast. The spirit manifests physically in an unoccupied space that you can see within range. This corporeal form uses the {@creature Bestial Spirit|UA2020SpellsAndMagicTattoos} stat block. When you cast the spell, choose an environment: Air, Land, or Water. The creature physically resembles an animal of your choice that is native to the chosen environment, which also determines one of the movement modes in the creature's stat block. The creature disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends.
